articles.description: Today, Virat Kohli is a legend of the game, while Rahul Dravid is Team India's head coach. Dravid had to wait almost 16 months to finally see from the dressing room Kohli scoring his first Test century in over three years. | Cricket
articles.content: Rahul Dravid has seen Virat Kohli from the time he was a teenager breaking into the Indian team. Kohli was coming through the ranks when Dravid was reaching the end of his career. In fact, during Dra… [+3639 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Bangladesh whitewash world champion England in T20 series: See Pics - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Bangladesh whitewashed world champion England in their Twenty20 series by winning the third game by 16 runs on March 14. Opener Litton Das hit a career-best 73 and Najmul Hossain Shanto 47 not out for Bangladesh to put up 158-2 on a slow Mirpur pitch.

articles.title: MI's Kalita Takes A Blinder! - Rediff.com
articles.description:
Jintimani Kalita took a splendid catch against Gujarat Giants in the Women's Premier League on Tuesday. 
The 19 year old is the only player from Assam to be picked in the WPL.
